content: we love this tank we love the vertical crochet and the wide v neck we love the deconstructed edges and it s easy casual feel most of all we love the drape the quinn fast summer crochet tank is a sleeveless top with a simple half_double_crochet stitch and simple edging it features a v neck design with wider comfortable shoulder straps the tank is crocheted in vertical row and not horizontally side to side there is a simple double_crochet edge around the v neck and simple optional frill edging around the base the quinn fast summer crochet tank is a made to measure pattern designed for beginners and super fast and easy to crochet
